replies.author: aipaiJJ
replies.txt_content:
shuai2695718960 发表于 2016-2-17 23:29
看不懂
公会插件自己选
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... sortid&sortid=7
宠物的话我就把原话复制一下
为什么只有OP能抓宠物？
你没有把- MyPet.user.leash.<MyPet-物种>- MyPet.user.keep.<MyPet-物种>权限写入玩家组里！leash、keep必须同时写入！

replies.author: aipaiJJ
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: yangoo
replies.txt_content:
aipaiJJ 发表于 2016-2-17 23:36
公会插件自己选
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=forumdisplay&fid=138&filter=sortid&sortid=7
宠物 ...
公会插件http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 6463&highlight=公会
给权限；
mangaddp builder 权限节点
权限节点：
- MyPet.user.command.capturehelper
- MyPet.user.command.release
- MyPet.user.command.respawn
- MyPet.user.command.name
- MyPet.user.leash.<MyPet-Type>

replies.author: yangoo
replies.txt_content:
yangoo 发表于 2016-2-18 00:08
像这样/mangaddp builder MyPet.user.command.capturehelper
MyPet.user.leash.宠物类型    比如PIG

replies.author: shuai2695718960
replies.txt_content:
yangoo 发表于 2016-2-18 00:08
像这样/mangaddp builder MyPet.user.command.capturehelper
那个是干嘛的
/mangaddp XXX权限组 MyPet.user.leash.*       *可以写动物名称或者怪物名称设置只抓某样东西
